theDuelist:SealedPack.NAME: Sealed Booster
DESCRIPTIONS: Open a #yLegend #yof #yBlue #yEyes booster pack. Add #b5 random cards from this set to your hand.

theDuelist:SealedPackB.NAME: Sealed Pack
DESCRIPTIONS: Open a booster pack containing cards from #yPharaoh's #yServant and #yMetal #yRaiders. Add #b5 random cards from either of these sets to your hand.
